summary: This document is an email chain between attorneys at Wigdor LLP, specifically David Gottlieb and Jeanne M. Christensen, arranging an introductory call with an external recipient. The subject is an introduction, and the emails contain standard legal confidentiality disclaimers.

persons.name: Jeanne M. Christensen
persons.context: She is a partner at Wigdor LLP who is being introduced to an external party via email to discuss setting up a future call with a client.

persons.name: David Gottlieb
persons.context: He is a partner at Wigdor LLP who sends an introductory email to an external recipient, copying Jeanne M. Christensen.

connections.description: Both are partners at the same law firm, Wigdor LLP, as indicated in their email signatures and the introductory context.

events.title: Scheduled introductory call
events.description: Jeanne M. Christensen proposes a call for the next day (May 26) at 11 am to discuss setting up a longer call with a client in the near future.

locations.context: The business address of Wigdor LLP, as listed in the email signatures of both David Gottlieb and Jeanne M. Christensen.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated May 25, 2023, involving attorneys from Wigdor LLP arranging an external introduction.
Jeanne M. Christensen seeks to schedule a call to discuss setting up a longer call with a client.
The emails contain standard legal confidentiality and attorney-client privilege disclaimers.
The correspondence appears routine and professional, with no direct mention of the Epstein case, victims, or related legal matters within the provided text.
